title: Clarification and getting turned on and suddenly off
body:
I would like some clarification on whether you can tell if the rewards are going to be champions only or sometimes (like mentioned in the posts) milestone rewards like gemstones, emotes and other exclusive stuff. So I recently opened a champion capsule from leveling and got excited after seeing this.
https://imgur.com/iQgZhhq
https://imgur.com/14pq7wQ
https://imgur.com/s4ko3IE
https://imgur.com/FgQIc1Z
https://imgur.com/QxVuSGz
I was instantly turned off because I found out there are no gemstones. 
{{sticker:sg-janna}} 

If any problems occur with accessing the photos or something please leave a comment thanks.

replies.body:
Only milestone I've reached is 40 so far, and so far, definitely no gemstones. You'll get emotes every so often for certain milestones, but it's pretty much exclusively going to be champion shards. 

(Also, the emotes cost blue essence to actually unlock anyway.)
You only get gemstones at very high level milestones.  Something like lv 50,75.

I don't recall anything saying you'd get gemstones or stuff from leveling up.

Also "Milestones" are every 10 levels to my knowledge.
